rooms.name: Utility Area

openings.description: Large windows strategically placed for ample natural lighting and ventilation, also facilitating industrial style aesthetics.

additional_features.name: Central Courtyard
additional_features.description: A landscaped courtyard at the center of the villa provides a relaxing open space. It enhances natural lighting and ventilation in all rooms, also serving as a social area for gatherings.

additional_features.name: Swimming Pool
additional_features.description: A compact swimming pool located in the east wing provides relaxation without excessive water usage. Its placement follows Vastu guidelines to promote positive energy.
